title: T206 Newspaper Ads for Sale - Hindu and Old Mill
author: Brass23

posts.post_title: T206 Newspaper Ads for Sale - Hindu and Old Mill
posts.post_content:
UPDATE***
As requested I sent out emails to everyone that requested pictures of the ads. 
Both full page Hindu ads have been sold as well as the full newspaper and one poster

The two Old Mill ads are still available and one poster


How many of you have seen Old Mill and Hindu newspaper ads depicting the sale of tobacco with baseball cards...I'm sure quite a few. Now how many of you own the actual ads? Well I am looking to sell them. I have quite a few so if you are seriously interested in purchasing one or all of them then send me an email to [url]kilaartist@aol.com[/url] and I will send you the images.

T206Museum.com has a few of these ads for sale online for between $180-$220 but they are cut out ads. I have full newspaper sheets for sale which would look great hanging up in your man cave or home. Hindu ads are larger then the Old Mill ads.

Thanks,

Doug

PS: Member name used to be Colorado723 but changed it back to Brass23 with help from Leon. Thanks Leon
email sent.. I think you bought the hundus from me I would love to have them back..PLEASE

I have sent two emails, one on Tuesday and one on Wednesday.  If they are already sold, you should at least post it on here if you aren't going to respond to emails.

Mark
Email sent right after you posted, but I haven't received a response.
I have also not received a response.

dog pile on the rabbit...dogpile on the rabbit!

[url]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VcqdzJ-nnpE[/url]

Pm sent after everyone...just to see if I get a response!

Peter, the kids loved the bugs bunny video!
